product.careInstructions: Sterilize instruments rigorously and check for wear before use.

product.name: Neutrogena Deep Clean Facial Cleanser
product.description: A Deep Clean Facial Cleanser by Neutrogena suitable for Oily, Combination. Helps improve skin health and appearance.
product.how_to_use: Apply to wet skin, massage, rinse thoroughly.

customer_reviews.top_negative_review: Can be slightly drying for sensitive skin.

product.careInstructions: Use morning and night.

product.name: Bioderma Atoderm Cream
product.description: A Moisturizing Cream by Bioderma suitable for Dry, Very Dry Skin. Helps improve skin health and appearance.
product.how_to_use: Apply morning and night on clean skin.

customer_reviews.top_negative_review: Can feel slightly thick on oily skin.

product.careInstructions: Use morning and night.

product.name: Patient Monitoring System (Multi-Parameter)
product.description: Comprehensive monitor for continuous tracking of ECG, SpO2, NIBP, and temperature in critical care.
product.careInstructions: Regularly check sensor connection points and calibrate vital sign modules.

product.name: Famotidine (Pepcid)
product.description: Used to treat and prevent ulcers in the stomach and intestines. It also treats conditions where the stomach produces too much acid.
product.careInstructions: Can be taken with or without food.
product.ingredient_list: Famotidine, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Magnesium Stearate, Talc, Hypromellose, Titanium Dioxide.

product.name: Metoclopramide (Reglan)
product.description: Used to treat heartburn caused by GERD and to speed up stomach emptying in people with diabetic gastroparesis.
product.careInstructions: Take 30 minutes before meals.
product.ingredient_list: Metoclopramide Hydrochloride, Lactose Monohydrate, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Corn Starch, Magnesium Stearate.

product.name: Automated Immunoassay Analyzer
product.description: Fully automated system for fast and accurate quantitative measurement of hormones and infectious disease markers.
product.careInstructions: Maintain reagent inventory and perform scheduled fluidics system cleaning.

product.name: Mesalamine (Asacol/Lialda)
product.description: An anti-inflammatory drug used to treat mild to moderate ulcerative colitis and to prevent symptoms from flaring up.
product.careInstructions: Consult a physician for dosage and use.
product.ingredient_list: Mesalamine, Lactose Monohydrate, Sodium Starch Glycolate, Magnesium Stearate, Talc, Titanium Dioxide.

product.name: Eucerin Hyaluron-Filler Day Cream SPF 30
product.description: A Day Cream with SPF by Eucerin suitable for Normal, Dry Skin. Helps improve skin health and appearance.
product.how_to_use: Apply morning on clean skin.

customer_reviews.top_negative_review: May feel slightly thick for oily skin.

product.careInstructions: Use morning.

product.name: Bariatric Wheelchair
product.description: Heavy-duty wheelchair designed for patient comfort and support with high weight capacity.
product.careInstructions: Check tire pressure and inspect frame welds periodically.

product.name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Moisturizer
product.description: An Oil-Free Moisturizer by Neutrogena suitable for Oily, Acne-Prone Skin. Helps improve skin health and appearance.
product.how_to_use: Apply morning and night on clean skin.

customer_reviews.top_negative_review: Light moisturizer, may need layering.

product.careInstructions: Use morning and night.

product.name: Panadol (Paracetamol)
product.description: A common over-the-counter medication used for the relief of pain and to reduce fever.
product.careInstructions: Do not exceed the recommended dose.
product.ingredient_list: Paracetamol (Acetaminophen), Starch, Povidone, Potassium Sorbate, Talc, Stearic Acid.

product.name: Ophthalmology Slit Lamp
product.description: Device used for detailed examination of the anterior and posterior segments of the human eye.
product.careInstructions: Keep optics dust-free and align light source accurately.

product.name: La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Baume B5
product.description: A Multi-Repairing Balm by La Roche-Posay suitable for Sensitive, Dry Skin. Helps improve skin health and appearance.
product.how_to_use: Apply as needed on affected areas.

customer_reviews.top_negative_review: Slightly thick for daytime use.

product.careInstructions: Use as needed.

product.name: Loperamide (Imodium)
product.description: Used to slow down the movement of the gut, which helps to reduce the frequency of bowel movements and make the stool less watery.
product.careInstructions: Do not use for more than 2 days without consulting a doctor.
product.ingredient_list: Loperamide Hydrochloride, Lactose, Corn Starch, Talc, Magnesium Stearate.

product.name: Surgical Headlight System
product.description: High-intensity LED headlight system for clear illumination during complex surgeries.
product.careInstructions: Charge battery fully before use and check fiber optic cable for damage.

product.name: Eucerin UltraSensitive Soothing Cream
product.description: A Soothing Cream by Eucerin suitable for Sensitive, Redness-Prone Skin. Helps improve skin health and appearance.
product.how_to_use: Apply morning and night on clean skin.

customer_reviews.top_negative_review: May feel thick for oily skin.

product.careInstructions: Use morning and night.

product.description: Used for the short-term treatment of constipation. It works by stimulating the muscles in the bowel to cause a bowel movement.
product.careInstructions: Take with a full glass of water.
product.ingredient_list: Bisacodyl, Lactose Monohydrate, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Magnesium Stearate, Hypromellose, Titanium Dioxide.

product.name: Oxygen Concentrator (High Flow)
product.description: Provides continuous, high-concentration oxygen for patients with severe respiratory needs.
product.careInstructions: Clean or replace air intake filters regularly and monitor oxygen output purity.

product.name: The Ordinary Alpha Arbutin 2% + HA

product.how_to_use: Apply a few drops morning and night before moisturizer.

product.name: Voltaren (Diclofenac)
product.description: A potent pain reliever and anti-inflammatory agent used to treat joint pain, muscle aches, rheumatoid arthritis, and gout.
product.careInstructions: Consult a physician for dosage and use.
product.ingredient_list: Diclofenac Sodium, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Lactose Monohydrate, Magnesium Stearate, Hypromellose, Titanium Dioxide.

product.name: Fetal Monitor (CTG)
product.description: Cardiotocography (CTG) device to monitor fetal heart rate and uterine contractions during labor.

product.name: Electrosurgical Unit (ESU)
product.description: Used to cut tissue and control bleeding during surgery using high-frequency electric current.
product.careInstructions: Inspect return electrode pad site and verify power settings before activation.

product.description: This foaming gel cleanser is designed for normal to oily skin. It removes dirt, oil, and makeup without disrupting the skin's protective barrier.

product.name: The Ordinary Retinol 1% in Squalane
product.description: A highly stable, water-free solution of pure retinol to reduce fine lines, photo damage, and signs of aging.

product.name: Portable Dental Unit
product.description: Compact, portable unit containing all essential tools for mobile dental care (drill, suction, scaler).
product.careInstructions: Drain water lines and sterilize handpieces after every use.

product.name: Lactulose (Duphalac)
product.description: Used to treat constipation by drawing water into the colon, which softens the stool. It is also used to treat hepatic encephalopathy.

product.description: Broad-spectrum SPF 60 sunscreen for face and body. Non-greasy formula providing advanced protection from UVA and UVB rays.

product.careInstructions: Reapply every 2 hours during sun exposure.

product.name: Biochemistry Analyzer
product.description: Automated system for analyzing blood and other fluids for chemical components like cholesterol and liver enzymes.
product.careInstructions: Run daily quality control checks and maintain waste container levels.

product.name: Paulas Choice Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant

product.name: Prozac (Fluoxetine)
product.description: Used to treat major depressive disorder, obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD), and panic disorder. It works by increasing the level of serotonin in the brain.
